name: 2-Player Combat
description:
The game created is a simple 2-player combat game that allows the user to teleport and use weapons to inflict damage to another player. The game currently uses only two weapons bullets and blades. The game has a block like structure to it which is implemented completely in 2D

Player One Controls:

A – left, W – up, S-down, D-right and Q – bullets, E – blades

Player Two Controls :

Arrow Up – up, Arrow Down - down, Arrow Left – left, Arrow Right- right, and Page Up - blades, Left Control - bullets. 

Teleportation One - Way - entrance top of screen.
